feature.label: iSphere Journal Explorer for RDi 9.5.1.3+ (optional)
feature.description: iSphere Journal Explorer for RDi 9.5.1.3+ The "iSphere Journal Explorer Feature (RDi)" provides a set of views for exploring journals. It can be started from menu 'Window -> Show View'.
